channel.title: Really annoying error which keeps causing crashes -.-
channel.description:
I keep getting this error every now and again in runserver.bat even with 1 user on -.-'
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 1 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savechar(client.java:23364) at client.process(client.java:11234) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) [/code]
I beg that someone helps me i really need help with this :S
Please..
